thread.section_title: Dresslily 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Dresslily 的点评意见 | dresslily.com
thread.title: Sheila Miller
thread.title_full: Dresslily 的点评人 Sheila Miller

author: Sheila Miller
title: Sheila Miller
text: Still waiting for Jan 10, 2017 order paid by PayPal. Communication has been like a maze. After 6 weeks I checked my account and it showed that I had no order. After mailing the company suddenly my account showed that I had order. Oder was tracked to USA. As of today, 03/17/2017 I still do not have my order. PayPal says I have to contact company.
